titles.title: Avenger: Endgame
titles.description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins due to the efforts of the Mad Titan, Thanos. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers must assemble once more in order to undo Thanos’ actions and restore order to the universe once and for all.

titles.title: Dearth of Dick
titles.description: A gripping drama that explores the consequences of power and betrayal.

titles.title: Hidden Life
titles.description: A historical drama based on the true story of an Austrian farmer's moral resistance to the Nazi regime.

titles.title: John Wick: Chapter 5
titles.description: The continuing saga of John Wick as he seeks revenge against those who wronged him.

titles.title: Nightmare Angel
titles.description: A supernatural thriller about a haunted artifact that brings chaos to those who possess it.

titles.title: Us
titles.description: A family’s serene beach vacation turns to chaos when their doppelgängers appear and begin to terrorize them.

titles.title: Wonder Woman
titles.description: An Amazonian princess leaves her sheltered life to explore the world and stop a massive conflict.

titles.title: Joker
titles.description: A psychological thriller that explores the origins of the iconic villain, Joker, as he descends into madness.

titles.description: A German thriller series that explores time travel and its impact on human nature.
